definition: arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
arteries and veins/network of blood vessels/vascular system (of a plant or animal)/(fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric")/overall context
the rise and fall of the terrain (idiom)/(fig.) the whole sequence of events/causes and effects
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
main artery (blood vessel)/fig. main highway/arterial road
to feel the pulse/to take sb's pulse

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the curative effects of laparoscope operation and spermatic veins operation in patients with spermophlebectasia.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察腹腔鏡與開放手術治療精索脈曲張的療效。

sentences.english: The Honghuagou gold deposit belongs to magmatic hydrothermal quartz vein type.
sentences.chinese: 紅花溝金礦牀屬岩漿熱液型脈狀金礦。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore relationship between the sphygmograms of the radial arteries and coronary heart disease(CHD).
sentences.chinese: 目的，爲了探討寸口脈脈象圖和冠心病的關係。

sentences.english: The value which was calculated using this approximation formula of pulse duration was close to that of solving the rate equations by computer.
sentences.chinese: 使用脈寬表示式計算的結果與計算機數值計算相符。

sentences.english: The laser power, pulse width and extra magneto-field can be varied in a wide range.
sentences.chinese: 它具有激光功率，脈寬以及外磁場變化範圍大的特點。

sentences.english: Conclusions Variations of the intrahepatic portal vein branching are not rare.
sentences.chinese: 結論肝內門脈變異並不少見。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE:To explore the mechanism of Huiyang Fumai injection against shock.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討回陽復脈注射液抗休克的療效機理。

sentences.english: Ureaplasma urealyticum is a major pathogen which caused urogenital infections.
sentences.chinese: 解脲脲脈原體是引起泌尿生殖道感染的重要病原體。

sentences.english: Tornadoes are most frequently reported east of the Rocky Mountains during spring and summer months.
sentences.chinese: 颶風大部份是在春季及夏季發生在洛磯山脈東方。

sentences.english: Changde is called Wuling in the ancient time, which is located a transitional area between Wuling mountains and Dongting Lake.
sentences.chinese: 常德古稱武陵，地處武陵山脈向洞庭湖的過渡地帶。

sentences.english: Taut pulse is relevant to most diseases.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，與弦脈相關的臨牀疾病範圍較廣。

sentences.english: But the basic land based models can only hit North American targets west of the Rocky mountains.
sentences.chinese: 但是基本陸基型只能打擊洛磯山脈西面的北美目標。

sentences.english: Diplomatically, Hamas has cast a wide net.
sentences.chinese: 在外交方面，哈馬斯廣結人脈。

sentences.english: The modern research find that the pulse at Cunkou is a multi-dimensional information convergence point.
sentences.chinese: 現代研究發現，寸口脈是一個多維信息的交匯點。

sentences.english: The 3 prominent, green veins of the glumes are an obvious feature of the spikelet.
sentences.chinese: 穎片的3突出，綠色的脈是一個小穗的明顯的特徵。

sentences.english: Put your hand on the wrist cushion. I'll take your pulse.
sentences.chinese: 把手放在脈枕上，我給你號脈。

definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
arteries and veins/network of blood vessels/vascular system (of a plant or animal)/(fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric")/overall context
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
to pierce through/to pass through/to be stringed together/string of 1000 cash
